tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  rating INT NOT NULL,
  review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_reviews (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    brand VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT,
    review TEXT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE bicycle_brands (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR(50),
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(50),
    founding_year INT,
    website VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE UserReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    brand_name VARCHAR(50),
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE BicycleBrands (brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY, brand_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL) 
CREATE TABLE BicycleModels (model_id INT PRIMARY KEY, model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, brand_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES BicycleBrands(brand_id)) 
CREATE TABLE UserReviews (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, model_id INT NOT NULL, review_text TEXT NOT NULL, rating INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES BicycleModels(model_id)) 
CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
